name: RFA Management Company
overview:
RFA Management Ltd is a holding investment company whose assets are its controlling shareholdings in its operating subsidiaries. These subsidiaries are playing a leading role in the provision of mortgage finance for proven developers of retirement village facilities in Australia. In addition to this the company is establishing itself as a funds manager in its own right.

With the ageing of the Australian population, the demand for finance facilities to allow for construction and development of retirement villages will only increase. In recent years RFA Management has positioned itself so as to take advantage of the growth and to provide investment opportunities in this dynamic, expanding sector of the Australian economy.
